conventions.dash_policy: classify em/en/hyphen as separate tokens; all dash types normalize to "-"
conventions.bracket_policy: strip underscores and outer brackets from stage spans

spans.text: OCTAVIUS CAESAR, Triumvir after his death.
LUCILIUS, TITINIUS, MESSALA, young CATO, and VOLUMNIUS, Friends to
VARRO, CLITUS, CLAUDIUS, STRATO, LUCIUS, DARDANIUS, Servants to Brutus
Senators, Citizens, Soldiers, Commoners, Messengers, and Servants.
SCENE: Rome, the conspirators’ camp near Sardis, and the plains of
